featured.text: Their relaxing bath will be 17 a full fluff dry and brush-out.

definition.zh_def: 輕柔的物質或填充物，通常用於增加體積或舒適度。
definition.en_def: Soft, light material or filling used to add volume or comfort.
definition.example: The pillow was filled with soft fluff, making it very comfortable to sleep on.
